availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p: I duly appointed and commissioned by the a Commissioner for the said Anson N Hoskinsresident in the City of Philadelphia in the said Commonwealth of Pennsylvania do solemnly affirm I will well and faithfully execute and perform all the duties of said Commissioner of Deeds &c under and by virtue of the Laws of the said State of Kentucky.Governor of the state of Kentuckystate of Kentucky

figure.ab:
A N HOSKINS
COMMISSIONER
OF DEEDS &C

body.p: Affirmed and subscribed before me this 31st day of January 1865. --

figure.ab:
A N HOSKINS
COMMISSIONER
OF DEEDS &C

COURT OF COMMON PLEAS
PHILADELPHIA, PENNA

body.p: Prothonotary of the Court of Common Pleas for the City & County of Philadelphia & Commonwealth of Pennsylvania

Comr Deeds
Oath of
A. N. Hoskins
